name: Turret Terminator
description:
Turret Terminator is a sci-fi style top-down shooter with a dynamic gameplay.

As the terminator you must destroy all turrets in every levels.
Dodge bullets destroy enemies and unlock powerful weapons.
Challenge different levels and have fun. Features:
  • 80 levels

  • Sci-fi style graphics

  • Dynamic gameplay

  • Achievements

  • Steam Trading Cards
